sentences.sContent: native tribes oppressed by the authorities
sentences.sCn: 受到当局压迫的土著部落

sentences.sContent: The gloom in the chapel oppressed her.
sentences.sCn: 小教堂的阴暗气氛使她感到压抑。

synos.tran: 压迫，压抑；使……烦恼；使……感到沉重

words.tran: 压迫的；沉重的；压制性的；难以忍受的
压抑；镇压；压迫手段；沉闷；苦恼

trans.tranOther: to treat a group of people unfairly or cruelly, and prevent them from having the same rights that other people in society have
